2D Error Bar Properties

Requires: Base Development System

Property Description
Format:X Scale Format Sets the format string of the X scale. Details
Format:Y Scale Format Sets the format string of the Y scale. Details
Plot Specific:Active Plot Gets or sets the active plot. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Name Shows the name of the plot. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Color Shows the color of the plot. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Fill to Sets the baseline of the fill. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Interpolation Specifies the interpolation of the plot. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Line Style Specifies the line style. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Line Width Sets the width of the plot (0-5). Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Mode Sets whether the error bar displays on the Y axis only or on both X and Y axes. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Point Fill Color Sets the color of the point and the fill. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Point Style Sets the point style of the error bar. Details
Plot Specific:Error Bar Size Sets the symbol size for the error bar. Details
Plot Specific:Marker Line Color Sets the color of the error bar line. Details
Plot Specific:Marker Line Style Specifies the error marker line style, as shown on the shortcut menu from top-left to bottom-right. Details
Plot Specific:Marker Line Width Sets the width of the error marker. Details
X Scale:Editable Allows you to edit the value of the scale. Details
X Scale:Flipped If TRUE, reverses the positions of the minimum and maximum values on the scale. Details
X Scale:Mapping Mode Specifies the scale mapping mode. Details
X Scale:Visible Shows the scale. Details
X Scale:Style Specifies the scale style. Details
X Scale:Scale Fit Fits the scale to the data. Details
X Scale:Offset and Multiplier:Offset Sets the offset, or initial, value for scaling data using (Δx) �x + xo. Details
X Scale:Offset and Multiplier:Multiplier Sets the multiplier, or interval, for scaling data using (Δx) �x + xo. Details
X Scale:Tick:Major Tick Color Sets the color of the major tick mark. Details
X Scale:Tick:Minor Tick Color Sets the color of the minor tick mark. Details
X Scale:Grid:Major Grid Color Sets the color of the major grid on the scale. Details
X Scale:Grid:Minor Grid Color Sets the color of the minor grid on the scale. Details
X Scale:Range:Minimum Sets the minimum value of the scale. Details
X Scale:Range:Maximum Sets the maximum value of the scale. Details
X Scale:Range:Increment Sets the increment value of the scale. Details
X Scale:Range:Minor Increment Minor increment value of scale. Details
X Scale:Range:Start Sets the start value of the scale. Details
X Scale:Marker:Visible Indicates whether the tick marker is visible. Details
X Scale:Marker:FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the tick marker. Details
X Scale:Marker:BG Color Specifies the background color of the tick marker. Details
X Scale:Marker:Font Name Specifies the font name of the tick marker. Details
X Scale:Marker:Font Size Specifies the font size of the tick marker. Details
X Scale:Marker:Font Bold Indicates whether the text is bold. Details
X Scale:Marker:Font Italic Indicates whether the text is italic. Details
X Scale:Marker:Font Strike Indicates whether the text is in the strikeout font. Details
X Scale:Marker:Font Underline Indicates whether the text is underlined. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Visible Indicates whether the name label is visible. Details
X Scale:Name Label:FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the name label. Details
X Scale:Name Label:BG Color Specifies the background color of the name label. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Font Name Specifies the font name of the name label. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Font Size Specifies the font size of the name label. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Font Bold Indicates whether the text is bold. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Font Italic Indicates whether the text is italic. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Font Strike Indicates whether the text is in the strikeout font. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Font Underline Indicates whether the text is underlined. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Justification Gets and sets the justification. Details
X Scale:Name Label:Text Displays text in the scale. Details
Y Scale:Editable Allows you to edit the value of the scale. Details
Y Scale:Flipped If TRUE, reverses the positions of the minimum and maximum values on the scale. Details
Y Scale:Mapping Mode Specifies the scale mapping mode. Details
Y Scale:Visible Shows the scale. Details
Y Scale:Style Specifies the scale style. Details
Y Scale:Scale Fit Fits the scale to the data. Details
Y Scale:Offset and Multiplier:Offset Sets the offset, or initial, value for scaling data using (Δx) �x + xo. Details
Y Scale:Offset and Multiplier:Multiplier Sets the multiplier, or interval, for scaling data using (Δx) �x + xo. Details
Y Scale:Tick:Major Tick Color Sets the color of the major tick mark. Details
Y Scale:Tick:Minor Tick Color Sets the color of the minor tick mark. Details
Y Scale:Grid:Major Grid Color Sets the color of the major grid on the scale. Details
Y Scale:Grid:Minor Grid Color Sets the color of the minor grid on the scale. Details
Y Scale:Range:Minimum Sets the minimum value of the scale. Details
Y Scale:Range:Maximum Sets the maximum value of the scale. Details
Y Scale:Range:Increment Sets the increment value of the scale. Details
Y Scale:Range:Minor Increment Minor increment value of scale. Details
Y Scale:Range:Start Sets the start value of the scale. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Visible Indicates whether the tick marker is visible. Details
Y Scale:Marker:FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the tick marker. Details
Y Scale:Marker:BG Color Specifies the background color of the tick marker. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Font Name Specifies the font name of the tick marker. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Font Size Specifies the font size of the tick marker. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Font Bold Indicates whether the text is bold. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Font Italic Indicates whether the text is italic. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Font Strike Indicates whether the text is in the strikeout font. Details
Y Scale:Marker:Font Underline Indicates whether the text is underlined. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Visible Indicates whether the name label is visible. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:FG Color Specifies the foreground color of the name label. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:BG Color Specifies the background color of the name label. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Font Name Specifies the font name of the name label. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Font Size Specifies the font size of the name label. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Font Bold Indicates whether the text is bold. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Font Italic Indicates whether the text is italic. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Font Strike Indicates whether the text is in the strikeout font. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Font Underline Indicates whether the text is underlined. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Justification Gets and sets the justification. Details
Y Scale:Name Label:Text Displays text in the scale. Details
